subject: Football
Weather
lead_paragraph: Heinz Field, the site for Saturday night’s wild-card game between the Steelers and Jaguars, is considered by many N.F.L. players to be the worst grass field in the league.
snippet: Heinz Field, the site for Saturday night’s wild-card game between the Steelers and Jaguars, is considered by many N.F.L. players to be the worst grass field in the league.
